title: Consultant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Global Partnership for Education
Interview Descriptions: Virtual interview, direct interview with a hiring manager who will assign and supervise the work - the interview took about 30 minutes with five or six questions on direct substantive knowledge and some logistical questions as the position was consultancy
Interview Questions: Please tell me more about your experience managing similar projects in developing countries.

title: Executive Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Global Partnership for Education (Washington, DC)
Interview Descriptions: Submitted application materials and was called in for an interview not too long after. It was a little unclear what the formal process was, but that's not too unusual for this sector. It also seemed like they were a little unsure of what exactly they were looking for.
Interview Questions: What are some of the most important partnerships/relationships in this sector?
